sentences.en: a look that spoke volumes.
sentences.cn: 一个意味深长的眼神。

sentences.en: A substantial proportion of the population speak a French-based patois.
sentences.cn: 人口中有一大部分说以法语为基础的混合语。

sentences.en: Before the poor wretch had time to speak, he was shot.
sentences.cn: 这个可怜的人还没来得及开口就中了枪。

sentences.en: can't see the forest for the trees, so to speak.
sentences.cn: 恕我直言，不能一叶障目不见森林

sentences.en: Could I speak to you in private a moment, John?
sentences.cn: 约翰，我可以单独跟你说一会儿话吗？

sentences.en: Could I speak to you in private a moment, padre.
sentences.cn: 可否私下跟您谈谈，牧师。

sentences.en: Don't speak to me like that. Don't you dare.
sentences.cn: 不要那样跟我讲话。我不允许！

sentences.en: He spoke very softly (= quietly ) .
sentences.cn: 他说话声音非常轻柔。

sentences.en: I need to speak with her right this minute.
sentences.cn: 我现在就需要跟她谈谈。

sentences.en: I was so shocked I couldn’t speak.
sentences.cn: 我震惊得说不出话来。

sentences.en: I've no capital—well, none to speak of.
sentences.cn: 我没有资金，真的，少得不值一提。

sentences.en: It seemed she found it difficult to speak ill of anyone.
sentences.cn: 她似乎觉得说别人的坏话很难。

sentences.en: Many of them can speak two or three or more languages.
sentences.cn: 他们当中许多人都会说两三门语言，有的人甚至更多。

sentences.en: My own life is the only thing I can speak authoritatively about.
sentences.cn: 我只对自己的生活有发言权。

sentences.en: Pressure appears to be mounting for conformity in how people speak English.
sentences.cn: 要求人们讲规范英语的压力似乎越来越大。

sentences.en: She drove away before either of them could speak again.
sentences.cn: 没等他俩中任何一人再开口，她就驾车而去。

sentences.en: Sonia might not speak the English language well, but then who did?
sentences.cn: 索尼娅的英语也许说得不好，但谁又说得好呢？

sentences.en: speaking of cost, can I afford to buy it?.
sentences.cn: 谈到费用问题，我买得起它吗？。

sentences.en: the figures speak for themselves.
sentences.cn: 这些数字就足够说明了。

sentences.en: the government will be forthright in speaking out against human rights abuses.
sentences.cn: 政府将会明确声明反对践踏人权。

sentences.en: the rent had to be paid, not to speak of school fees.
sentences.cn: 房租要交，更不要说还要交学费。

sentences.en: The Ukrainians speak a Slavonic language similar to Russian.
sentences.cn: 乌克兰人所说的那种斯拉夫语系的语言类似于俄语。

sentences.en: The university refused to let Dick Gregory speak on campus.
sentences.cn: 这所大学不让迪克·格雷戈里在校园里发表演说。

sentences.en: there was no independent body to speak up for press freedoms.
sentences.cn: 没有任何独立团体支持新闻自由。

sentences.en: They rather looked down their noses at anyone who couldn't speak French.
sentences.cn: 他们相当瞧不起不会说法语的人。

words.tran_cn: 可说出口的；可以交谈的
演讲的；富于表情的，雄辩的
演讲者；扬声器；说话者；说某种语言的人
说话（speak的过去分词）；为…装轮辐

phrases.phrase: nothing (或 no——, none) to speak of
phrases.tran_cn: ［表明只有非常少的一点］不值一提
无需进一步说明，不言而喻
（在宗教拜神仪式中）讲不为人知的语言
说出：勇敢和自由地说出，例如关于公众问题
勇敢地说：大胆地说出或毫不犹豫地说
（姿态，环境，物体）含义深刻，意味深长
［引入最近谈到过的一个话题］谈起；提到

trans.tran_en: to use your voice to produce words

trans.tran_cn: [spoke-spoken] 说话， 讲话； 演说， 发言； 表达意见； 说， 讲；
trans.tran_en: to use your voice to produce words

trans.tran_cn: 讲，谈，演说，从某种观点来说
